title: Risk Matrix – Cybersecurity Risk Assessment Platform
description: A comprehensive web platform to identify, assess, and manage cybersecurity risks using a dynamic risk matrix model. Supports structured risk analysis across multiple categories with interactive UI, automatic matrix positioning, contextual recommendations, and exportable PDF reports.

title: Forensic Analysis of Push-to-Talk Communication Apps on Android
description: In-depth forensic examination of Zello, Voxer, and Voice Ping using static, dynamic, and post-mortem analysis. Identified authentication token leakage, plaintext storage of sensitive data, and poor cryptographic practices with major privacy implications.

title: Offensive Toolchain for Simulating Common Exploits
description: Multifunctional exploit framework simulating buffer overflows, DLL hijacking, ransomware, and rootkit-based keylogging. Combined Python-based vulnerability emulation with Rust payloads in a controlled testbed for security research and education.

title: Penetration Testing of Virtualised Infrastructure
description: Led a structured pentest across a virtualised environment with Metasploitable 2, pfSense, and Windows XP. Identified 40+ high-risk issues including RCEs, default credentials, and insecure protocols with CVE documentation and CVSS 3.1 scoring.

title: Advanced Networking and ISP Architecture Design
description: Architected a multi-ISP network infrastructure using GNS3 supporting IPv4 and IPv6. Engineered BGP and OSPF routing solutions, implemented MPLS L3VPN services for enterprise clients, and designed redundant paths for high availability.

title: Enterprise Network Topology Design and Implementation
description: Designed an enterprise network connecting three datacenters with redundant ISP connections. Created high-availability solutions with failover mechanisms, disaster recovery procedures, and scalable storage with automated backup systems.

title: SDN Controller for MikroTik Devices
description: Centralized SDN management platform for MikroTik devices using C# and ASP.NET Core. Engineered automated network configuration workflows, real-time monitoring of network metrics, and integrated WireGuard VPN management.

title: Gesture Translation and Recognition
description: AI-powered gesture recognition system for real-time sign language translation. Created scalable architecture for multiple users, implemented TensorFlow ML models for gesture detection, and built a streaming pipeline for real-time processing.

title: 3D Web Interface for Product Visualisation
description: Interactive 3D product visualization platform using Three.js and Node.js. Implemented WebGL-based rendering optimizations, real-time texture and lighting manipulation, and responsive design supporting multiple device formats.

title: Kubernetes Management Application
description: Comprehensive Kubernetes orchestration dashboard for streamlined cluster management. Monitoring of cluster health metrics, automated deployment workflows, and resource optimization with intuitive interfaces for managing containers, pods, and services.

title: Voting Application on Blockchain
description: Decentralized voting platform utilizing Ethereum smart contracts and Solidity ensuring vote immutability and transparency. Implemented zero-knowledge proofs for voter privacy with Vue-based frontend and MetaMask wallet authentication.

title: SOMIOD – IoT Middleware Platform
description: Middleware platform enabling seamless IoT device integration and data interchange. RESTful API for device management, real-time event notification via MQTT, and data transformation pipelines for interoperability between diverse IoT platforms.

title: Space-Time WikiMaps
description: High-performance Java REST service leveraging Apache Jena and Spring Boot for SPARQL queries against Wikidata. Efficient query processing pipeline with automated result caching and 90% test code coverage.

title: Implementation of Virtualisation Systems
description: Designed and deployed virtualization environments using Hyper-V and VMware. Implemented failover clustering, iSCSI storage networks, PowerShell automation for resource optimization, and comprehensive monitoring systems.
